definition: season/the last month of a season/fourth or youngest amongst brothers/classifier for seasonal crop yields
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: It was found that giant pandas in Fopinghad tke habit of seasonal vertical movement.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，佛坪大熊貓有季節性垂直移動習性。

sentences.english: They were traditionally semisedentary, moving seasonally between fixed sites.
sentences.chinese: 他們是傳統的半定居部落，在定居點間季節性遷移。

sentences.english: Departures from seasonal jobs, such as Census taker, are not counted.
sentences.chinese: 季節性工作人員的離職，如普查人員，沒有加入統計。

sentences.english: Lake Aha, located in the suburb of Guiyang, Guizhou Province, is a medium artificial reservoir with seasonally anoxic hypolimina.
sentences.chinese: 貴州阿哈湖是一底層滯水帶季節性缺氧的中型人工湖。

sentences.english: Unseasonal rains can make animals come out of hibernation too early.
sentences.chinese: 非季節性的雨會導致動物提前出冬眠。

sentences.english: Also some rests assume the seasonal outbreak, many spring is taken bad in the fall.
sentences.chinese: 也有的息者呈季節性發作，多在秋春季發病。

sentences.english: Clouds and showers soon returned to Sochi, and the Black Sea returned to its seasonally typical tempestuous ways.
sentences.chinese: 雲和雨回到索契，黑海恢復季節性的洶湧。

sentences.english: Characteristics of sea ice floe size distribution in the seasonal ice zone.
sentences.chinese: 在季節性冰凍地帶海冰浮冰塊大小分佈的特性。

sentences.english: In some mountainous areas, the seasonal wheat becomes mature around the Summer Solstice.
sentences.chinese: 在一些山區，季節性小麥在夏至前後成熟。

sentences.english: Reproduction of Tibetan monkeys troop in Yulingkeng of Huangshan Mountain wasseasonality, and it belongs to the birth rhythm pattern.
sentences.chinese: 黃山短尾猴魚鱗坑羣爲季節性繁殖，屬產仔節律型。

sentences.english: Thankfully, they are seasonal and will pass by mid-summer.
sentences.chinese: 可幸的是，沙塵暴是季節性的，仲夏之後就會停止。

sentences.english: Flood period is seasonal or periodic flood rise phenomenon of rivers.
sentences.chinese: 汛是指江河等水域的季節性或週期性的漲水現象。
精巢的發育具有季節性。

sentences.english: There is little seasonal variation in the incidence of the disease.
sentences.chinese: 在該病的發病率方面存在着極小的季節性差別。

sentences.english: The supervision of the customs and the inspection of commodities should also be reinforced at seasonal frontier ports.
sentences.chinese: 季節性的邊境口岸也要加強海關監管和商品檢驗。

definition: variant of 復甦|复苏[fu4 su1]/to recover (health, economic)/to resuscitate/anabiosis
to slow/to slow down (the pace of)
to respond accordingly to/to adapt to/to cope with
to become hot/temperature rise/(fig.) to intensify/to hot up/to escalate/to get a boost
range (the difference between the lowest and highest values)
